summary: This document is an email from BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko to undisclosed recipients, sent on August 10, 2019, seeking confirmation of reports that Jeffrey Epstein had died. It represents media inquiry at the time of Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jane Lytvynenko
persons.context: BuzzFeed News reporter who sent an email seeking confirmation of reports about Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the reporter's inquiry regarding reports of his death.

events.title: Media inquiry about Epstein's death
events.description: BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko sends an email seeking confirmation of reports that Jeffrey Epstein has died.

keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko sent an email seeking confirmation of reports that Jeffrey Epstein had died.
The email indicates that media outlets were receiving reports of Epstein's death around that date.
The document is a direct media inquiry, showing the immediate public and journalistic response to the news of Epstein's death.
